params.value: "echo 'Starting Pipeline to Create an ELK Stack.'"
params.name: COMMANDS

processes.name: Create Storage Bucket for ELK
processes.description: Create a storage bucket for ELK stack

processes.name: Create VPC Network for ELK
processes.description: Create VPC Network for ELK Stack VM

processes.name: Clone Ansible Code
processes.description: Clone the Ansible code for on demand ELK Stack

processes.name: Setup Gcloud on the Agent
processes.description: Setup Gcloud command line utility on the Agent

params.value:
apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates gnupg -y
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg] https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt cloud-sdk main" | tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-cloud-sdk.list
curl https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | apt-key --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg add -
apt-get update && apt-get install google-cloud-sdk locales -y
locale-gen en_US en_US.UTF-8
echo 'LANG=en_US.UTF-8' >> /etc/environment
rm -rf /root/.ssh/google_*
params.name: COMMANDS

processes.name: Add GCP Config on the Agent
processes.description: Add GCP Config on the Agent

actions.name: Add GCP Config on the Agent

params.value:
"gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file="+kaholo.execution.configuration.gcp_config_file;
"echo 'y' | gcloud beta compute ssh --zone "+"'"+kaholo.execution.configuration.zone+"'"+" "+"elkuser@"+kaholo.execution.configuration.name+" "+"--project "+"'"+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+"'";
params.name: COMMANDS

processes.name: Create manual_data directory
processes.description: Create manual_data directory in the bucket

params.value: "mkdir manual_data ; touch manual_data/.keep ; gsutil cp -r manual_data gs://"+kaholo.execution.configuration.name+"-"+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+"/";
params.name: COMMANDS

params.value:
"echo "Hooray! Your ELK stack is ready..."
echo"+"
echo "URL: http://""+actions.VmIP.result+"
echo "USER: elastic""+"
echo "PASSWORD: ""+kaholo.execution.configuration.elastic_password;
params.name: COMMANDS

params.value:
"echo "Hooray! Your ELK stack is ready..."
echo"+"
echo "URL: http://""+actions.VmIP.result+"
echo "USER: elastic""+"
echo "PASSWORD: ""+kaholo.execution.configuration.elastic_password;
params.name: COMMANDS

params.value: "echo 'Starting Pipeline to Delete an ELK Stack.'"
params.name: COMMANDS

processes.name: Delete ELK Stack VPC Network/Firewall/Address
processes.description: Delete ELK Stack VPC Network, Firewall and External address

params.value: "gcloud compute firewall-rules delete "+kaholo.execution.configuration.name+"-"+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+" --project "+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+" --quiet ; gcloud compute networks delete "+kaholo.execution.configuration.name+"-"+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+" --project "+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+" --quiet ; gcloud compute addresses delete "+kaholo.execution.configuration.name+"-ext-addr --project "+kaholo.execution.configuration.project+" --region "+kaholo.execution.configuration.region+" --quiet"
params.name: COMMANDS
